name: Zero Emission
description:
Hey! I grew up playing Mega Man so I created my own version. Any feedback is appreciated! Hope you fun!! 

 FYI, I recommend playing with an Xbox controller, but you can use the keyboard.

("X"- Shoot,  

Space - Jump, 

Arrows - Move)

ONLY RUNS ON PC

Oi! Follow me if you like my work!
https://linktr.ee/2bitdetermine
